# Spellscatter (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Scalable Spells (Alphabetical List)|scalable]]]

**Level:** [[Oblivion (Domain)|Oblivion 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[Spellsinger]] 1, [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, XP (50 xp)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Kingdoms of Kalamar Player's Guide (Kenzer and Company), pg. 186

*Spellscatter* causes a target to lose 1d3 prepared spells. These spells are no higher than half the spell level of *spellscatter*. Sorcerers and bards lose 1d3 spell slots, as if they had cast those spells.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Duration changed to Instantaneous 

*House Rule:* Determine the total number of spells that the target has prepared that remain; roll randomly (by level) to determine which are lost.
